title: Drawing, "Mechanical Man, for A Gas, Light and Coke Co.", ca. 1935
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream paper
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Advertisement depicting a standing figure, with a watch on his side, wearing a top hat and holding a spyglass shaped like a spring, in color.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mechanical Man, for A Gas, Light and Coke Co.", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-913.
